This only applies to singular hits that heal at least 10 Hitpoints; multiple hits that add up to at least 10 Hitpoints healed do not benefit from the passive effect. Additionally, this stacks multiplicatively with bloodbark armour; when worn alongside the ancient sceptre, successful hits heal the caster by 38.5% of the damage dealt.
A 10% increase to Ice Rush's freeze duration is 8.8 ticks. As most calculations almost always round down due to the game's engine, this effectively results in no buffs for Ice Rush.
The value of fossils given to the Fossil Collector in exchange for numulites.
The GE value of numulites obtained from the Fossil Collector in exhange for fossils.

This phrase references the practice of denying service to individuals on the basis of race during the . The specific phrasing "serve your kind" may have originated in the film  (1977), in which the statement "We don't serve your kind here" is made towards C-3PO by the bartender of the Mos Eisley cantina. This phrasing has since entered general lexicon as a common reference to racist retailers.
Silver bolts are the only ranged weapons that can be used effectively against vampyres.

name: Solo Moons

Standard mining gloves affect silver, coal, and gold. Superior mining gloves affect mithril, adamantite, and runite. Expert mining gloves combine the effects of standard and superior gloves, while also affecting amethyst crystals.

Varrock armour 1 affects rocks up to gold, as well as tephra. Varrock armour 2 affects rocks up to mithril, as well as lovakite, sandstone, and granite. Varrock armour 3 affects rocks up to adamantite, as well as soft clay. Varrock armour 4 affects all standard rocks, including amethyst crystals.
Percentage chance stacks with Varrock armour.
Varrock armour 1 affects bars up to steel. Varrock armour 2 affects bars up to mithril. Varrock armour 3 affects bars up to adamantite. Varrock armour 4 affects all bars.

Does not stack with the completion of the medium and hard Ardougne Diaries. Completion of the medium diary causes the gloves to become ineffective and to not degrade within Ardougne; likewise, completion of the hard diary does the same in all of Gielinor, and makes the gloves completely obsolete.
Stacks with the completion of the easy, medium, and hard Ardougne Diaries.

NX mins means the crop will progress a growth stage on each X minutes growth tick. This happens N times until it is fully grown.
Grapes are received when the player harvests grape vines without a Bologa's blessing in their inventory.
Zamorak's grapes are received when the player harvests grape vines with at least one Bologa's blessing in their inventory, consuming the blessing.
Once fully grown, it will grow into the Hespori, a demi-boss that can be defeated for 12,600 Farming experience.
NX mins means the crop will progress a growth stage on each X minutes growth tick. This happens N times until it is fully grown.
Experience is only granted when the crop is planted.

name: anime
list: Anima plant effects are active as soon as they are planted. Over their life span of 85.3 hours (three and a half days), they grow from a seedling into a withering state. The withering state is one stage away from death; once it dies, they must be replanted to gain the effects once more.
NX mins means the crop will progress a growth stage on each X minutes growth tick. This happens N times until it is fully grown.
Only 1 spirit tree can be planted at a time initially. This limit can be increased by levelling up Farming.
NX mins means the crop will progress a growth stage on each X minutes growth tick. This happens N times until it is fully grown.

The herbs are lesser amounts of Toadflax, and greater amounts of either Harralander or Tarromin. The amount of Toadflax is 1/2 the other herb plus 1, up to 10. So the max Herb reward is 10 Toadflax and 20 Harralander or Tarromin.
Total values indicate the combination Coal + Iron ore (e.g. a reward of 21 would be 14 Coal and 7 Iron).

The damage roll for Zuk's projectile attack consists of a single roll between 0 and the average of its maximum Magic hit and maximum Ranged hit. The max hit of the mage attack is 128, while the range attack's max hit is 169. The melee max hit is 251, but it is never used.
